name: goTanks
description:
Game inspired by Battle City and powered by Godot 3.0

When I was a kid, the Battle City was my favorite game. We played it together with my younger brother. It was inspiring for me, to do the clone of this game now. To finally have enough skills to do this on my own.

And there you go. The game that give me joy when I played it  so long ago, give me joy again, and now as my own creature.

It was fun to work on it, and I hope, that it will be fun to play.

There is a single and two players mode. The controls is:

Player 1:
Up, Down, Left, Right - movement;
Space - fire

Player 2:
W, A, S, F - movement;
Tab - fire

The game is free and open source. The source is under MIT License:

https://github.com/Acvarium/goTanks
